column2: Federal and Provincial leaders in Canada and Phillipine authorities Intervene in the murder investigation of Harry Doyle
column5: So that justice will be served promptly,,,Harry Doyle was murdered in the Philippines in Aug. 2012. His wife Jane was charged and the arrest warrant was issued in Aug. 2013. Jane fled to Canada very shortly after Harry was murdered. Jane knew she was being questioned and perhaps considered a suspect when she fled. At the time she fled Jane was pregnant
